# blinkenrocket
Here are some animations for the [Blinkenrocket](http://www.blinkenrocket.de) hardware.

Currently these are all animations, which I either created by myself or found somewhere on the internet (credits are given). However, you are welcomed to contribute!

In order to add the animations to your own [Blinkenrocket editor](http://blinkenrocket.de/webedit-react/), just click on the `Install` link.

Some more animations can be found [here by LeonGeorgi](https://github.com/LeonGeorgi/blinkenrocket).
[maggo](https://github.com/maggo/blinkblink) has created a converter from animated GIFs to blinkenrocket URLs.



## Birds
A flying bird animation.

![Birds animation](images/Birds.gif)

[Install](http://blinkenrocket.de/webedit-react/?)

Animation found [on Twitter by Tetrapix](https://twitter.com/tetrapixberlin/status/946899891254693890)



## Flash
Shows the animation, which is also used when flashing new data to the blinkenrocket.

![Flash animation](images/Flash.gif)

[Install](http://blinkenrocket.de/webedit-react/?)

Animation by [ToBeHH](https://github.com/ToBeHH/).



## Ghost
Animation with the Pac-Man Ghost.

![Ghost animation](images/Ghost.gif)

[Install](http://blinkenrocket.de/webedit-react/?)

Animation by [ToBeHH](https://github.com/ToBeHH/).



## Heart
An animated heart

![Heart animation](images/Heart.gif)

[Install](http://blinkenrocket.de/webedit-react/?)

Animation found [on twitter](https://twitter.com/chaospott/status/1033100849382412290).



## Heartbeat

A simulated heartbeat line.

![Heartbeat animation](images/Heartbeat.gif)

[Install](http://blinkenrocket.de/webedit-react/?)

Animation found [on twitter by @overflo](https://twitter.com/overflo/status/950120110911614976).



## Here
Shows an animation to find a person quickly in the crowd.

![Here animation](images/Here.gif)

[Install](http://blinkenrocket.de/webedit-react/?)

Animation by [ToBeHH](https://github.com/ToBeHH/).



## I love XING
Shows first an "I", then a heart and then the XING logo and finally a blank screen.

![I love XING animation](images/I_love_XING.gif)

[Install](http://blinkenrocket.de/webedit-react/?)

Animation by [ToBeHH](https://github.com/ToBeHH/).



## Loading
A loading animation with three dots.

![Loading animation](images/Loading.gif)

[Install](http://blinkenrocket.de/webedit-react/?)

Animation by [ToBeHH](https://github.com/ToBeHH/).

## Sleeping
Shows an animation with `z`s to indicate that I am sleeping at the moment.

![Sleeping animation](images/Sleeping.gif)

[Install](http://blinkenrocket.de/webedit-react/?)

Animation by [ToBeHH](https://github.com/ToBeHH/).

## Up Arrows
Shows a upwards flying arrow.
![Up animation](images/Up.gif)

# Contributing

You are wery welcomed to add your own animations via Pull Requests. To do so:
- modify this `README.md` file
- keep the alphabetical order
- make 3 empty lines between each animation
- create an image with `ruby run.rb [THE URL]` in the images directory
- link the image
